CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1958, pg. 22, reads: "The Best - Five of the eight winners in Senior Open Division of the Golden Gloves are, from left to right: Flyweight Charley Rose, Glen Hazel Boys Club; bantam weight Pable Caripides, Steubenville A. C.; featherweight Andero Gonzales, Roy A. C.; lightweight Carmie Jrice [Price], Ambridge Boys Club, and welterweight Carl Jordan, Glen Hazel. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Golden Gloves Senior Open Division boxing champions, including from left: flyweight Charley Rose, bantam weight Pable Caripides, featherweight Andero Gonzales, lightweight Carmie Price, welterweight Carl Jordan, and three others wearing satin robes and posed with left fists raised, in Pitt Field House, University of Pittsburgh
